name: Natron Project File
summary: Learn about .NTP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Natron revolves around the use of nodes rather than layers for creating visual effects. Node-based compositing features a node-graph, which allows you to see all the effects added to a video.

description: Project created by Natron, a node-based compositor used to create visual effects for film and television; contains project data, which includes nodes, output format, number of views, frame rate, and other project settings.
